lead_paragraph: FELDMAN--Suzanne Shaub, passed away peacefully Friday April 1st, 2016 in Manhattan surrounded by her husband Howard and her two children, Jess Wade and Allison Page. She was a loving wife of 49 years, a devoted mother and grandmother, and a great friend too all, including her extended family. Granddaughter to Benjamin Shaub, founder of Shaub's in Lancaster a 127 year old business. In 1759 Suzanne's family originally settled in Strasburg Pennsylvania under the Penn Charter. Suzanne's second home was in Lancaster, Pennsylvania. She was a member of the Hamilton Club as well as a third generation member of the Lancaster Country Club. She was a graduate of Stephens College. Suzanne was an avid collector and advisor of contemporary art. She was a beloved friend to the art community in New York, Paris, Brazil, and London. She amazed everyone with her kindness and caring giving Nature. Her greatest joy was her granddaughter, Adelaide on whom she doted and to whom she was devoted. A funeral service will be held at 11am on Thursday, April 7th, at St. Ignatius Loyola, 980 Park Avenue at 84th Street. A private cremation will follow. Friends will be received on Wednesday from 3pm-7pm at the Frank E. Campbell "The Funeral Chapel", 1076 Madison Ave., New York, NY 10028. In lieu of flowers, donations in her memory can be made to St. Jude's Hospital for Children and Memorial Sloan Kettering. 1/3
